original_text: Do you think I cannot call on my Father, and he will at once put at my disposal more than twelve legions of angels?
korean_text: 너는 내가 내 아버지께 구하여 지금 열두 군단 더 되는 천사를 보내시게 할 수 없는 줄로 아느냐

sentences.original_text: Do you think I cannot call on my Father
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 아버지께 부르짖을 수 없다고 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: and he will at once put at my disposal
more than twelve legions of angels?
